product_name: CamelBak Octane LR Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Octane LR Hydration Pack holds its 70 fl. oz. reservoir in your lumbar region for great comfort and stability while adventure racing or on fast-paced trail runs or rides. Ventilated back panel and air-mesh harness enhance cooling airflow. 70 fl. oz. (2L) Antidote(TM) Lumbar Reservoir has compression to keep water from sloshing around. External fill makes replenishing your water supply quick and convenient. On the front you'll find dual overlapping pockets and a stretch mesh overflow for efficient gear organization. Stretch mesh pockets on the harness keep nutrition, your smartphone or other essentials within easy reach when you're on the move. CamelBak Octane LR Hydration Pack provides a whistle on the harness and reflectivity for enhanced safety in low light.
short_description: The CamelBak Octane LR Hydration Pack holds its 70 fl. oz. reservoir in your lumbar region for great comfort and stability while adventure racing or on fast-paced trail runs or rides.
